name: myalgia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
pain in the muscles: He still complained of weakness and myalgia, but his pneumonia had been cured. Possible side effects include myalgias, vomiting, chills, and lingering headache.
More examplesFewer examplesShe went to her doctor after a week of fever, chills, headache, myalgia, vomiting and diarrhoea. Except for myalgia, he was entirely asymptomatic.This infection may also present as nonspecific flu-like symptoms, including fever, malaise, myalgias, and headache.
